channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloudlinux OS -- cagefs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloudlinux OS -- cagefs

item.title: CVE-2020-36772|2024-08-04T17:37:07.219Z -- cloudlinux%20os -- cagefs
item.description: CloudLinux CageFS 7.0.8-2 or below insufficiently restricts file paths supplied to the sendmail proxy command. This allows local users to read and write arbitrary files of certain file formats outside the CageFS environment.

item.title: CVE-2020-36771|2024-08-04T17:37:07.145Z -- cloudlinux%20os -- cagefs
item.description: CloudLinux CageFS 7.1.1-1 or below passes the authentication token as a command line argument. In some configurations this allows local users to view the authentication token via the process list and gain code execution as another user.
